imagePullSecrets.description: Docker registry secret name for pulling images

name.description: Docker registry secret name for pulling images

digest.description: Sha256 Image Digest.  It is strongly recommended to use this for verification.

env.description: common environment variables apply to all guac services

tolerations.description: common tolerations apply to all guac services

dayBetweenRescan.description: Day(s) to wait before the certifier rescanning - commonly apply to all certifiers. Default 0 means only run once

batchSize.description: sets the batch size for pagination query for the certifier - commonly apply to all certifiers. Default 60000

latency.description: sets artificial latency on the certifier - commonly apply to all certifiers. Defaults to empty string (not enabled) but can set m, h, s...etc.

enabled.description: Whether to create the guac-cm configMap
String Whether to deploy OCI Collector

name.description: String Name of the OCI Collector component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for oci collector deployment

command.description: Command for the OCI Collector image.  It is not recommended to override this.

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create OCI Collector service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the ociCollector deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy Deps.Dev Collector

name.description: String Name of the Deps.Dev Collector component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for depsdev collector deployment

command.description: Command for the Deps.Dev Collector image.  It is not recommended to override this.

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create depsDevCollector service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the depsDevCollector deployment

depsDevLatency.description: - sets artificial latency on the deps.dev collector. Defaults to empty string (not enabled) but can set m, h, s...etc.

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy OSV Certifier

name.description: String Name of the OSV Certifier component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for OSV Certifier deployment

command.description: Command for the OSV Certifier Collector image.  It is not recommended to override this.

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create osvCertifier service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the OSV Certifier deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy CD Certifier

name.description: String Name of the CD Certifier component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for CD Certifier deployment

command.description: Command for the CD Certifier Collector image.  It is not recommended to override this.

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create cdCertifier service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the cd Certifier deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy Ingestor

name.description: String Name of the ingestor component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for ingestor deployment

command.description: Command for the ingestor image.  It is not recommended to override this.

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create ingestor service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the ingestor deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy CollectSub

name.description: String Name of the CollectSub component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for CollectSub deployment

command.description: Command for the CollectSub image.  It is not recommended to override this.

ports.description: Port the CollectSub container listens on

containerPort.description: Port the CollectSub container listens on

port.description: Port the CollectSub service listens on

targetPort.description: Port the CollectSub container listens on

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create collectSub service account

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the collectSub deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy GraphQL Server

name.description: String Name of the GraphQL Server component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for GraphQL Server deployment

command.description: Command for the GraphQL Server image.  It is not recommended to override this.

ports.description: Port the GraphQL Server container listens on

containerPort.description: Port the GraphQL Server container listens on

svcPorts.description: Protocol used at the the GraphQL Server

protocol.description: Protocol used at the the GraphQL Server

port.description: Port the GraphQL Server service listens on

targetPort.description: Port the GraphQL Server container listens on

backend.description: which backend to use - keyvalue (default) | arango | ent.

debug.description: Enable debug mode for graphql server; also enable the UI

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

create.description: - whether to create graphqlServer service account

createNodePortService.description: - Whether to deploy a NodePort type service

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the graphqlServer deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy the restApi

name.description: String Name of the restApi component.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for restApi deployment

command.description: Command for the restApi image.  It is not recommended to override this.

ports.description: Port the restApi container listens on

containerPort.description: Port the restApi container listens on

svcPorts.description: Protocol used at the the restApi

protocol.description: Protocol used at the the restApi

port.description: Port the restApi service listens on

targetPort.description: Port the restApi container listens on

create.description: - whether to create restApi service account

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

resources.description: - [map] resource requests or limits of the restApi deployment

enabled.description: String Whether to deploy the visualizer.

replicas.description: Number of replicas for visualizer deployment

tag.description: Tag if using an image tag.  Optional

digest.description: Sha256 Image Digest.  It is strongly recommended to use this for verification.

ports.description: Port the visualizer container listens on

containerPort.description: Port the visualizer container listens on

port.description: Port the visualizer service listens on

targetPort.description: Port the visualizer container listens on

nodeSelector.description: - sets the node selector for where to run the deployment

deployServiceMonitor.description: Boolean Deploy the service monitor for observability

ingest.description: Boolean Whether to ingest sample data after deployment

jobName.description: Name of the sample data ingest job

env.description: Environment variables for the sample data ingest job

enabled.description: Whether to deploy an Ingress object
Whether to deploy an Ingress object to expose API only
Whether to deploy Traefik IngressRoute object

db-driver.description: database driver to use, one of [postgres | sqlite3 | mysql] or anything supported by sql.DB

db-migrate.description: Wether to automatically run database migrations on start

db-debug.description: Enable debug logging for database queries

collectorPublishToQueue.description: Whether to publish ingestion message to pubsub queue

enabled.description: Whether to deploy nats
Boolean for enabling JetStream.
Whehter to run natsbox
Boolean to enable data collection
Boolean to enable nats service monitor

namespace.description: String nats service monitor namespace - this is for monitoring purposes and is used by Prometheus

release.description: Label to associate nats service monitor with GUAC for monitoring purposes

enabled.description: Whehter to deploy minio as part of the Helm deployment

mode.description: minio mode, i.e. standalone or distributed

enabled.description: Whether to add atlas init-container in graphql-server to manage schema migration via atlas. Defaults to false

command.description: Command for the atlas migration. Overriding default entrypoint to read backend DB connection string from guac-cm

repository.description: Path to the atlas migration image

digest.description: Sha256 Image Digest. It is strongly recommended to use this for verification.

name.description: Name of the atlas migration component
